text: Noor Mohamed Hassanali, TC (13 August 1918 – 25 August 2006) was a Trinidadian politician.Then-Prime Minister A. N. R. Robinson, quoted in A dignified figure of T&T; politics , Trinidad Guardian, 26 August 2006. He was the second President of Trinidad and Tobago. He served from 1987 to 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography from Nalis. * Biographical summary from Nalis. * Noor Hassanali: Trinidad's Living Legend – Nancy Graydon, Border Lines, University of Toronto; Fall 2003. * Hassanalis 50th Anniversary – Angela Pidduck Category:1918 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Presidents of Trinidad and Tobago
title: Noor Hassanali
